range.registration_rule: Standards track or IESG-approved experimental RFC

record.name: body
record.description: Provides a test for matching against the the body of the message being processed

record.name: comparator-* (anything starting with "comparator-")
record.description: adds the indicated comparator for use with the :comparator argument

record.name: convert
record.description: adds a new Sieve test and action that enable Sieve scripts to perform data conversions on the message being delivered.

record.name: date
record.description: The "date" extension gives Sieve the ability to test date and time values.

record.name: duplicate
record.description: Adds test 'duplicate' that can be used to test whether a particular message is a duplicate, i.e., whether a copy of it was seen before by the delivery agent that is executing the Sieve script.

record.name: editheader
record.description: Adds actions 'addheader' and 'deleteheader' that modify the header of the message being processed

record.name: enclose
record.description: adds the "enclose" action for enclosing a message with a wrapper.

record.name: encoded-character
record.description: changes the interpretation of strings to allow arbitrary octets and Unicode characters to be represented using US-ASCII

record.name: enotify
record.description: adds the 'notify' action for notifying user about the received message. It also provides two new tests: valid_notify_method checks notification URIs for validity; notify_method_capability can check recipients capabilities.

record.name: envelope
record.description: adds the 'envelope' test for testing the message transport sender and recipient address

record.name: envelope-deliverby
record.description: The "envelope-deliverby" extension extends the envelope test to allow checking of information associated with the Deliver-By ESMTP extension defined in .

record.name: envelope-dsn
record.description: The "envelope-dsn" extension extends the envelope test to allow checking of information associated with the DSN ESMTP extension defined in .

record.name: environment
record.description: The "environment" extension provides a new environment test that can be used to implement scripts that behave differently when moved from one system to another or otherwise operated in different contexts.

record.name: ereject
record.description: adds the 'ereject' action for refusing delivery of a message. The refusal should happen as early as possible (e.g. at the protocol level) and might not preserve the exact reason for refusal if it contains non-US-ASCII text.

record.name: extlists
record.description: Adds the ":list" match type to certain Sieve tests, and the ":list" argument to the "redirect" action. The ":list" match type changes tests to match values against values stored in one or more externally stored lists. The ":list" argument to the redirect action changes the redirect action to forward the message to email addresses stored in the externally stored list.

record.name: extracttext
record.description: adds the "extracttext" action for extracting text from a MIME body part.

record.name: fcc
record.description: Adds the ":fcc" parameter to Sieve action commands that generate additional messages.

record.name: fileinto
record.description: adds the 'fileinto' action for delivering to a mailbox other than the default

record.name: foreverypart
record.description: adds the "foreverypart" and "break" actions for iterating through MIME parts of a message.

record.name: ihave
record.description: The "ihave" extension provides a means to write scripts that make use of other extensions only when they are actually available.

record.name: imapsieve
record.description: Add Sieve processing for IMAP events.

record.name: imap4flags
record.description: Adds actions and tests for manipulating IMAP flags

record.name: include
record.description: adds the "include" command to execute other Sieve scripts, the "return" action from an included script, and the "global" command and "global" variables namespace to access variables shared among included scripts.

record.name: index
record.description: The "index" extension provides a means to limit header and address tests to specific instances when more than one field of a given type is present.

record.name: mailbox
record.description: adds test for checking for mailbox existence and a new optional argument to fileinto for creating a mailbox before attempting mail delivery.

record.name: mailboxid
record.description: adds a test for checking mailbox existence by OBJECTID, and new optional arguments to fileinto and :fcc that allow selecting the destination mailbox by OBJECTID.

record.name: mboxmetadata
record.description: adds tests for checking for mailbox metadata item existence and for retrieving of a mailbox metadata value.

record.name: mime
record.description: adds the ":mime" and ":anychild" tagged arguments to the "header", "address", and "exists" tests. Adds the ":type", ":subtype", ":contenttype", and ":param" options when ":mime" is used with the "header" test.

record.name: redirect-deliverby
record.description: The "redirect-deliverby" extension extends the redirect action to allow specification of the BY ESMTP parameter associated with the Deliver-By SMTP extension defined in .

record.name: redirect-dsn
record.description: The "redirect-dsn" extension extends the redirect action to allow specification of the NOTIFY and RET ESMTP parameters associated with the DSN SMTP extension defined in .

record.name: reject
record.description: adds the "reject" action for refusing delivery of a message. The exact reason for refusal is conveyed back to the client.

record.name: relational
record.description: Extends existing conditional tests in Sieve language to allow relational operators

record.name: replace
record.description: adds the "replace" action for replacing a MIME body part of a message.

record.name: servermetadata
record.description: adds tests for checking for server metadata item existence and for retrieving of a server metadata value.

record.name: spamtest
record.description: Provides a test to check for varying likelihood of an email message being spam.

record.name: spamtestplus
record.description: Provides a test to check for varying likelihood of an email message being spam, possibly using a percentage range.

record.name: special-use
record.description: adds a test for checking whether an IMAP special-use attribute is assigned for a particular mailbox or any mailbox, and it adds the ability to file messages into a mailbox identified solely by a special-use attribute.

record.name: subaddress
record.description: adds the ':user' and ':detail' address parts for use with the address and envelope tests

record.name: vacation
record.description: adds an action for generating an auto-reply saying that the original message will not be read or answered immediately

record.name: vacation-seconds
record.description: adds the ":seconds" parameter to the Sieve Vacation extension. Implementations that support this MUST also support "vacation".

record.name: variables
record.description: Adds support for variables to the Sieve filtering language.

record.name: virustest
record.description: Provides a test to check for varying likelihood of there being malicious content in an email message.

record.name: vnd.cyrus.* (anything starting with "vnd.cyrus.")
record.description: Extends the Sieve language with vendor-defined functionality specific to the Cyrus IMAP server ().

record.name: vnd.dovecot.* (anything starting with "vnd.dovecot.")
record.description: Extends the Sieve language with vendor-defined functionality specific to the Dovecot Secure IMAP server ().

person.name: Jutta Degener
person.org: Sendmail, Inc. 6425 Christie Ave, 4th Floor Emeryville, CA 94608
